name: Lab Rat - WebGL
description:
Lab Rat is a puzzle game where you play as a rat in a 3D environment, jumping and scurrying around a science lab. Discover surrounding objects like buttons and lab equipment to escape  before the scientist's come back from lunch break. Ooh and that cheese looks rather tasty...

How to play:

Use WASD to move around and use mouse to rotate view. 

Space bar to jump .

Made by:

Jacob H, Mia W, Daniel W, Khalid, Julie, Ayo and Brendan
